feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing theme updates and affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend files including sections, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines global OKLCH-based blue, turquoise, and gold theme tokens for light and dark modes using Tailwind layers.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component rendering all sections, nav bar, gradient background, and admin panel overlay.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanelOverla: Modal admin overlay with password check and JSON display of stored queries or registrations using theme tokens.
frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx: Fixed navigation bar with smooth-scroll links and an Admin button using themed styling.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section with summit description, vision, and mission cards using theme-based styling and fade-in animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/AdminPa: In-page admin panel with password gate and JSON output for queries or registrations using theme tokens and fade-in.
frontend/src/components/sections/Committ: Displays organizing committee members using cards with fade‑in animation, showing names, roles, phone numbers, and emails.
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterS: Renders a simple footer with the current year and event name.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Creates the landing hero section with event branding, dates, and a brochure download button.
frontend/src/components/sections/index.t: Exports all section components from a single index file.
frontend/src/components/sections/Program: Shows a three‑day programme overview with titles and detailed descriptions, animated on scroll.
frontend/src/components/sections/QuerySe: Provides a query submission form that saves entries to localStorage and resets after submit.
frontend/src/components/sections/Registr: Contains a school registration form storing submissions in localStorage and confirming success.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous DFINITY actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useFadeInOnScroll.ts: Adds a CSS class when an element enters the viewport using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles, OKLCH theme color variables for light/dark modes, and utility classes such as Orbitron font and fade-in animations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn helper that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts App with global CSS.
frontend/src/utils/localStorageArrays.ts: Provides helpers to append to and retrieve arrays stored in localStorage with JSON parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with theme extensions based on OKLCH CSS variables, plugins, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, theme update requirements, and tracking for features and pending requests.
